## Vector4.normalize() method

Normalize a Vector4

**Signature:**

```typescript
static normalize(v: Vector4, result?: Vector4): Vector4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  v | [Vector4](doc/markdown/./base.vector4.md) | The input vector |
|  result | [Vector4](doc/markdown/./base.vector4.md) | _(Optional)_ The output vector (can be the same as v). if not specified, a new vector will be created. |

**Returns:**

[Vector4](doc/markdown/./base.vector4.md)

The output vector
